title: Nuxe Nalc
description: A system to convert institute policy into a formal system, where users query if actions are allowed; an SMT solver verifies statements with the rules in the policy, with a proof/disproof of your 'theorem' (action) using the 'axioms' (policies). It can also find mathematically proven loopholes/contradictions in policies.

title: ResearchWeb
description: A unified platform enhancing student–professor–research centre collaboration through a version-controlled website editor, a project connection board, and ML-powered semantic research matching. It simplifies content updates, improves project discovery, and intelligently connects students with relevant labs, faculty, and publications.

title: Hadron
description: An AI-powered social hub that turns dense papers into snackable slide-stories, conversational podcasts and crisp reels. Features open models-driven summaries, TTS podcasts, and vibrant lab communities with threads and open discussions for cross-domain innovation.

title: Santas And Their Elves
description: Combines a physical ON/OFF switch for real-time canteen status with app-based pre-ordering. Orders are accepted only when open, reducing confusion and crowding at campus canteens.

title: NoGradeDrop
description: A community-driven, AI-powered attendance notification ecosystem using computer vision and crowdsourcing to alert students when biometric attendance machines arrive in class.

title: SmartMess
description: An intelligent mess management system that reduces overcrowding through real-time crowd monitoring. Features a meal marketplace and data-driven analytics to improve mess efficiency and reduce food wastage.

title: UniGraph
description: Unifies the university experience via an interactive graph connecting courses and resources, alongside an intelligent agent that answers campus policy questions and auto-drafts official emails.

title: CampusBites
description: A web app that simplifies canteen ordering and payments across all IIIT canteens. It offers online ordering, secure payments, and a built-in wallet.

title: IBC (Introduction to Cut and Bulk)
description: Helps students manage diet needs despite fixed mess menus. Using live menu data and BMR/BMI metrics, it suggests personalized meals and tracks calorie progress.

title: SafeCampus
description: An anonymous grievance reporting system for gender-related incidents. Features anonymous chat, evidence upload, and a panic button to alert committees in real-time.

title: VibeCheck
description: A desktop environment that breaks coding assignments into stages and asks conceptual questions to ensure students learn concepts rather than generating code with AI.

title: IIITH Auth
description: A student-managed identity provider and lightweight authentication layer designed to bridge the gap between official CAS restrictions and student innovation.
